name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2
synopsis: Featuring 10-time World Champion Dave Mirra, this game will redefine extreme sports video games. This true sequel lets you ride as one of 14 top pros, build a killer BMX park from the ground up, pull over 1,500 tricks, and explore 8 massive levels.  Play the game that delivers the most engaging next-generation BMX experience anywhere!
